name: Touch of Death (itch)
description:
That's Vicky,the love of your life.

Unfortunately if you touch her she will die.

Everything you touch turns to death.

You're not the only one who loves her.

Goblins are totally crazy for her, but she's only got eyes for you.

Save her from the goblins, but be careful not to touch her.

Seriously if you even go near her you will kill her.

:(
